QuestData.Title: Ley Litter
QuestData.Description:
The ley line is here--I can feel it!
But first, we must stop the gnolls. That ancient will be their greatest weapon.
There are some ley crystals the gnolls have gathered. Thankfully, they don't seem to understand the power that the crystals hold.
Bring me as many as you can. They'll empower my mirror image and help me summon something useful from the Archives to take that monster down!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Ley Crystals from Brackenhide Outskirts.
QuestData.RewardText:
What were they doing with these? Using them as back scratchers?!
<Kalecgos pinches the bridge of his nose.>
...I suppose we should be grateful they didn't figure out their true potential.
